## Alphanumeric.interval() method

This method is called with every interval, or every time the clock should change, and handles the actual incrementing and decrementing the clock's `FaceValue`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interval(instance: FlipClock<any>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  instance | [FlipClock](./flipclock.flipclock.md)<!-- -->&lt;any&gt; |  |

**Returns:**

void
